author: cam
msg: 1. Fix NPE when the final animation for a given attribute/property is removed.
2. Ensure that when an exception is occurring once per animation tick, these
are not endlessly reported to the user.

author: jacopoc
msg: Added new jars to the Eclipse's .classpath file

author: agilliland
msg: fix for ROL-1381, potential null pointer in RollerRuntimeConfig.

author: kahatlen
msg: - Patch which improves the clearLimit() method by removing the
possibility that the byte array is ever null.
- Instead of using null when creating an empty ArrayInputStream an
- Change some callers of the 2-arg setLimit() to the 1-arg setLimit()
- Fix a bug where setData() would not reset the position to zero
(previously it was unmodified at a potentially invalid position)

msg: Fix scm urls, remove trailing slash.
